title: Where development has commenced as per the development permission/IOD issued prior to publication of these Regulations, the CC shall be issued or revalidated till completion of development in accordance with the plans/ approved , in respect of the said IOD including minor amendments thereof as per the then Regulations
clause_text: Where development has commenced as per the development permission/IOD issued prior to publication of these Regulations, the CC shall be issued or revalidated till completion of development in accordance with the plans/ approved , in respect of the said IOD including minor amendments thereof as per the then Regulations.
